title: Volume solid of rev. x-axis:  linear and rational

content.description: Let R be the region bounded by the y-axis and the graphs of y = <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>3</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C14@</annotation> </semantics> </math> and y = 4 - 2x, as shown in the figure above.
content.question: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is revolved about the x-axis.

frqParts.text: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is revolved about the x-axis.

topic.text: 8.11: Volume with Washer Method - Revolving Around the x- or y-Axis

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
